ObjectGroup

public ObjectGroup(Map map,
                   int origx,
                   int origy)
Creates an object group that is part of the given map and has the given origin.

Parameters:
map - the map this object group is part of
origx - the x origin of this layer
origy - the y origin of this layer

ObjectGroup

public ObjectGroup(java.awt.Rectangle area)
Creates an object group with a given area. The size of area is irrelevant, just its origin.

Parameters:
area - the area of the object group

mergeOnto

public void mergeOnto(MapLayer other)
Description copied from class: MapLayer
Merges the tile data of this layer with the specified layer. The calling layer is considered the significant layer, and will overwrite the data of the argument layer. At cells where the calling layer has no data, the argument layer data is preserved.

Specified by:
mergeOnto in class MapLayer
Parameters:
other - the insignificant layer to merge with

public void copyTo(MapLayer other)
